Class Student

java.lang.Object
workshop.Person
workshop.Student
public class Student extends Person
Represents a student who extends the basic personal information functionality of a Person with student-specific details. This class includes attributes such as student number, average mark, and the number of seminars they have taken. It also provides methods to determine eligibility for enrollment and retrieve the number of seminars attended.

  • Constructor Details

    • Student

      public Student(int studentNumber, int averageMark, int seminarsTaken, String name, String phoneNumber, String emailAddress, Address address)
      Creates a Student object with specified details, including student number, average marks, number of seminars taken, personal information, and address.
      Parameters:
      studentNumber - The unique identification number for the student.
      averageMark - The average mark obtained by the student.
      seminarsTaken - The total number of seminars the student has attended.
      name - The name of the student.
      phoneNumber - The phone number of the student.
      emailAddress - The email address of the student.
      address - The residential address of the student, represented as an Address object.

  • Method Details

    • isEligibleToEnroll

      public boolean isEligibleToEnroll(String country)
      Determines if a student is eligible to enroll based on the specified country.
      Parameters:
      country - the country to be checked for eligibility.
      Returns:
      true if the country matches the eligibility criteria, false otherwise.

    • getSeminarsTaken

      public int getSeminarsTaken()
      Retrieves the number of seminars taken by the student.
      Returns:
      the number of seminars attended as an integer.
